verses.text: \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Phatuel.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, ye \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w men|strong="H2205"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w did|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* ever \w happen|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*?

\w Tell|strong="H5608"\w* ye \w of|strong="H1121"\w* this \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* let \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*.

That which \w the|strong="H0398"\w* palmerworm hath left, \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w locust|strong="H0697"\w* hath \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* that which \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w locust|strong="H0697"\w* hath left, \w the|strong="H0398"\w* bruchus hath \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*: \w and|strong="H0398"\w* that which \w the|strong="H0398"\w* bruchus hath left, \w the|strong="H0398"\w* mildew hath \w destroyed|strong="H0398"\w*.

Awake, ye \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w mourn|strong="H1058"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w that|strong="H3588"\w* take delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w sweet|strong="H6071"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w*: \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* cheek \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lion’s|strong="H0738"\w* whelp.

\w He|strong="H7760"\w* hath \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* vineyard \w waste|strong="H8047"\w*, \w and|strong="H1612"\w* hath pilled \w off|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* bark \w of|strong="H8047"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*: \w he|strong="H7760"\w* hath \w stripped|strong="H2834"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w bare|strong="H2834"\w*, \w and|strong="H1612"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w away|strong="H7993"\w*; \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w branches|strong="H8299"\w* thereof \w are|strong="H8299"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w white|strong="H3835"\w*.

Lament \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

\w Sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* libation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord’s|strong="H3068"\w* \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w* \w is|strong="H0127"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7703"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* hath \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* corn \w is|strong="H0127"\w* wasted, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* \w is|strong="H0127"\w* confounded, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w oil|strong="H3323"\w* hath \w languished|strong="H0535"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* husbandmen are \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w vinedressers|strong="H3755"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* howled \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w is|strong="H7704"\w* \w perished|strong="H0006"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* vineyard \w is|strong="H1571"\w* confounded, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* hath \w languished|strong="H0535"\w*: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w palm|strong="H8558"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w apple|strong="H8598"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w withered|strong="H3001"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* withdrawn \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w Gird|strong="H2296"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H2296"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w lament|strong="H5594"\w*, \w O|strong="H1004"\w* ye \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*, ye \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*: \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, lie \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, ye \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* libation \w is|strong="H0430"\w* cut off \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* ye \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w*, \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w an|strong="H7121"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w*; \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ancients, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H2199"\w* ye \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w Ah|strong="H0162"\w*, \w ah|strong="H0162"\w*, \w ah|strong="H0162"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H7138"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* mighty.

\w Is|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w food|strong="H0400"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3772"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* beasts \w have|strong="H3588"\w* rotted \w in|strong="H8478"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* dung, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w barns|strong="H4460"\w* \w are|strong="H8478"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H2040"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w storehouses|strong="H0214"\w* \w are|strong="H8478"\w* \w broken|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* corn \w is|strong="H1715"\w* confounded.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* \w groan|strong="H0584"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* low? \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w yea|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H6629"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* perished.

\w To|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beautiful \w places|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flame|strong="H3852"\w* hath burnt \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* looked \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* garden bed \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thirsteth \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w rain|strong="H4325"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* springs \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w are|strong="H1571"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* beautiful places \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.
